version.description:
Sets the version in deno.json.

USAGE: deno task version <version>

build:npm.description:
Build the package for npm. No build step is required for JSR.

USAGE: deno task build:npm

test:segments.description:
Generate segments for test input strings using a recent version of ICU. These segments are used to mock `Intl.Segmenter` for consistent test results across runtimes.

USAGE: deno task test:segments

test.description:
Run all tests.

USAGE: deno task test

publish:jsr.description:
Publish the package to JSR.

USAGE: deno task publish:jsr

publish:npm.description:
Publish the package to npm.

USAGE: deno task publish:npm

publish.description:
Publish the package to JSR and npm.

USAGE: deno task publish
